title: In MC Escher’s Metamorphose, he transforms square tiles into...
description: In MC Escher’s Metamorphose, he transforms square tiles into hexagons by manipulating his iconic lizard pattern. These then go on to become honeycombs and three dimensional buildings. Inspired by Escher, this animation also alternates between a chessboard and a three-coloured hexagonal tessellation, and between 2 and 3 dimensions. [code]
